Summary: 3 u.f.o's in the night sky, changing intensity of illumination and creating a triangle with the other objects
divs: sighting detailsyou guys need to contact me. my friend and i had a sighting over the skies of los angles (we were in pico rivera looking due west) on the night of sunday jan. 10th. it appeared to have a striking resemblance to footage i have seen on your show (. 3 bright lights that appeared to be planes coming in for a landing, but when they started to hover in the sky we knew they weren't planes and when the intensity of lights began to alter while they formed a perfect triangle in the sky we knew that they were something we've never seen before. a perfect trangle..... they all dimmed and left in the same direction at the same intervals. 2 lights reappeared on my way home and i pulled over to watch them for about 3-4 minutes and i still have no explanation. no noise, plenty of other air traffic to give me a reference. i was basically shaking after the first time we watched them, unbelievable. they were able to go from a dim light to easily the brightest thing in the sky in a matter of seconds. why did they form a perfect triangle? i've watched a good amount of ufo footage and the like and never, ever thought i would ever see anything like this in my entire life. it was absolutely amazing because it reminded me very much of some footage i've seen on your show on a ufo in texas? the speed of these objects when they left and the way they changed light intensity was crazy. it's still very fresh in my mind, i'll never forget this. my friend found a report online that seemed to corroborate what we saw. (4 of us saw it, 2 at first). i watched them for maybe 5-7 minutes. thanks and good luck with your show, it's starting to strike home with me now. it's funny, it actually really didn't surprise me after i began to think about it. people have been seeing ufo's for a long time. i just never thought it would be this blatant and this amazing right here in pico rivera with that much light pollution. thanks again for your time. i can give a word for word description of what happened at any time. the events will never go away in my mind, i hope someone out there shot some video. i sent this to ufo hunters and just found your website. the most amazing thing about this was that they were able to go from the intensity of a dim star to a light that was 10 times brighter than any helicopter or plane in the sky and they all left in the same direction. incredible. 1. i was standing on my friends front porch smoking a cigarette. 2. i first noticed what looked like 3 planes coming towards us from the west, the intensity of light is what made me first notice it. 3. i didn't know what it was, i asked my friend and he said it could be air traffic from lax, but when they stopped in the sky and and slightly reconfigured themselves to form a perfect triangle is when i became suspect. 4. i think i've covered this. 5. i was shaking, i couldn't control my thoughts. i called my friend who has a similar mindset when it comes to these things and all he could say was "cms\tg\pd]". 6. the 3 objects disappeared in the same direction, with it's light decreasing as it moved south across the sky and out of view. the last one got really bright for a period then went in the same direction as the other two.
